definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to carve/carved words/to agree/a contract/a deed

sentences.english: John has a windfall . It surprises his wife greatly .
sentences.chinese: 約翰意外獲得一筆財富，使他夫人大喫一驚。

sentences.english: It is possible that you inadvertently took an excessive dose of an over-the-counter preparation.
sentences.chinese: 有可能是你把非處方藥喫過量了。

sentences.english: Don't eat up at one and you can have it after a while.
sentences.chinese: 別一下子全吃了，留一點過會兒再喫。

sentences.english: Why should cattle not graze near yew trees?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼牛不在紫杉附近喫草？

sentences.english: B. That's fine. May be I should have boiled eggs.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，也許我喫水煮蛋算了。

sentences.english: I can't wait to take a bite of the pumpernickel.
sentences.chinese: 我簡直迫不及待想喫一口黑包。

sentences.english: Also eat some fruits, milk and a small amount of soft drinks containing carbonic acid gas.
sentences.chinese: 還可喫一些水果，牛奶以及少量含碳酸氣的飲料。

sentences.english: After lunch my father dozes in his chair.
sentences.chinese: 喫過午飯後我父親總在他的椅子上打個盹。

sentences.english: The only time its okay to use your fingers is when it's a fish bone.
sentences.chinese: 只有在喫魚的時候，纔可以用手去捏魚骨頭。

sentences.english: They are strictly vegetarian and eat all manner of deep fried food.
sentences.chinese: 他們是嚴格的食素者，喫各種各樣的油炸食品。

sentences.english: They had pears in white wine, with a piece of fruitcake.
sentences.chinese: 他們喫着白葡萄酒醃泡過的梨子，配着水果蛋糕。
他們全喫光了那隻火雞。

sentences.english: Eat fat food less, no-noSmokeWine, answer to often maintain defecate unobstructed .
sentences.chinese: 少喫油膩食物，禁忌菸酒，並應經常保持大便通暢。

sentences.english: I think I need an ice-cream to chill out.
sentences.chinese: 我想喫支冰淇淋放鬆一下。

sentences.english: For the first three days, they ate nothing.
sentences.chinese: 頭三天，他們什麼也沒喫。

sentences.english: Well cook dumplings with seafood for you.
sentences.chinese: 我們煮海鮮水餃給你喫。

definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
hot and sour soup/sour and spicy soup
(video games) PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG)/battle royale game/last-man-standing game/to play PUBG (or similar game)/to win at PUBG (or similar game)
